Text:
86.54% Downloaded... and it's stopped now. :i 
I'm seeding though. 
I'll comment if it works when it's done and all that stuff.

Okay, got it installed. 
Works just fine.

Bit of instructions- 
First you need Toast Titanium, or something similar to mount the DMG's as discs.
Mount just the Install CD first, click install.
It will then ask for the Data CD, mount it as a disc as well.
To play you will need to mount the Data/Play DMG as a disc, which is fine with me.
No serial needed. Thanks.

Macbook 2008
OSX 10.6.8
2GB RAM
Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0
NVIDEA Geforce 9400M
FYI, this doesn't work on Lion (it's a PowerPC app).
